question: Assalaamu Alaikum.
answer:
QUESTION
I'm not fasting due to pregnancy and have recently been informed that I have to pay fidyah along with making up the missed days of fasting. Last year I was also pregnant during Ramadaan and didn't pay fidyah. Now that I know; do I have to pay last years fidyah also. Jazaakallah.
ANSWER


Share:
If you are a follower of the Hanafi Madhab, you are not required to pay
Fidyah. Only Qadhaa of the missed fasts is required.

However, according to the Shaaf'ee Madhab, if one has failed to make up the
missed fasts until the next Ramadhaan, he has to pay Fidyah together with
making up the missed fasts.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
